page.title: 20NATURE RESERVE cont.
page.content: {How did you get the job? I answered an advertisement for a job in Norfolk & later, as an experienced warden, applied for this one. {Do you enjoy the job? Which things do {you like best?} I enjoy being in the open air & I am interested in the counting & the changes which I record every day. {How many acres of land does the {Reserve cover? 180 acres (half a square mile). {Which main type of tree do you look {after? 20 000 yews of which many are 500 years old.One of the best yew forests in Europe. {Do you have any problem animals or {pests? The Grey Squirrel which should have been left in North America.
